title: Core Protector
description: Use a shield to protect the central core from incoming projectiles. A test of reflexes.
fallbackImage: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="300" height="160" viewBox="0 0 300 160"><rect width="300" height="160" fill="%23111111"/><!-- Core --><circle cx="150" cy="80" r="20" fill="%23FFFFFF"/><!-- Shield --><path d="M 150 35 A 45 45 0 0 1 195 80" stroke="%23FFFFFF" stroke-width="5" fill="none"/><!-- Projectiles --><circle cx="50" cy="50" r="5" fill="%23FFFFFF"/><circle cx="250" cy="60" r="5" fill="%23999999"/><circle cx="230" cy="120" r="5" fill="%23FFFFFF"/><circle cx="70" cy="110" r="5" fill="%23999999"/></svg>
